headline: Prediction: 2 Artificial Intelligence (AI) Stocks That Could Be Worth More Than Nvidia by 2030
summary: Despite the fanfare, the artificial intelligence (AI) revolution has just begun.  Companies like NvidiaÂ have already taken advantage of this growth, soaring to multitrillion-dollar market caps.  Over time, however, we could see one of these stocks surpass Nvidia's market cap, leading to huge gains for patient shareholders.
